display_name: [Battle to Reach the Top] Super Saiyan Vegeta (GT)

kit.leader_skill: "GT Heroes" or "Vegeta's Family" Category Ki +3 and HP, ATK & DEF +170%

super_attack.name: Galick Gun (Extreme)
super_attack.effect: Greatly raises ATK & DEF for 1 turn; Causes immense damage to enemy; Massively lowers DEF

passive_skill.name: Pure Strength
passive_skill.effect: (Forever) ATK & DEF 250% up; (Forever) Randomly changes Ki Spheres of a certain Type to Rainbow Ki Spheres; When attacking with 12 or more Ki: ATK 20% up, DEF 30% up and damage reduction rate 3% up per Ki Sphere obtained; 3 or more Ki Spheres obtained: Guards all attacks; 5 or more Ki Spheres obtained: Launches an additional Super Attack; Per "GT Heroes" or "Giant Ape Power" Category ally attacking in the same turn (depending on which Category has more members) (self excluded): ATK 77% up; Chance of performing a critical hit 30% up; For 1 turn from the character's entry turn: Launches an additional Super Attack; When activating the Active Skill: ATK 350% up temporarily

lines.text: Randomly changes Ki Spheres of a certain Type to Rainbow Ki Spheres
ATK 20% up, DEF 30% up and damage reduction rate 3% up per Ki Sphere obtained
lines.context: When attacking with 12 or more Ki
3 or more Ki Spheres obtained
5 or more Ki Spheres obtained
Per "GT Heroes" or "Giant Ape Power" Category ally attacking in the same turn (depending on which Category has more members) (self excluded)

lines.text: Chance of performing a critical hit 30% up
lines.context: Per "GT Heroes" or "Giant Ape Power" Category ally attacking in the same turn (depending on which Category has more members) (self excluded)
For 1 turn from the character's entry turn
When activating the Active Skill

active_skill.name: Unrelenting Final Shine Attack
active_skill.effect: Massively raises ATK temporarily; Causes ultimate damage to enemy
active_skill.activation_conditions: Can be activated after performing 4 or more s in battle (once only)
